summary: This document appears to be a prison medical record for Jeffrey Epstein, noting a psychological observation follow-up. It documents his reported depression and anxiety symptoms, and mentions he was scheduled to go to court on an upcoming Wednesday.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the prison medical record, identified by his inmate number #76318-054. The document notes his psychological state, including depression and anxiety symptoms, and mentions he has an upcoming court date.

events.title: Epstein's Psychological Observation
events.description: A follow-up psychological observation of Jeffrey Epstein in prison. The document notes he reported symptoms of depression, anxiety, nervousness, and sadness. It was unclear whether he endorsed feeling hopeless about life or experiencing auditory/visual hallucinations.

events.title: Epstein's Upcoming Court Date
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein stated he was scheduled to appear in court on an upcoming Wednesday. The specific court proceeding is not detailed.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was under psychological observation in prison, with documented symptoms of depression, anxiety, nervousness, and sadness.
Epstein reported having an upcoming court date on a Wednesday, though the specific date and nature of the proceeding are not provided in this excerpt.
The medical assessment was unclear on whether Epstein endorsed feelings of hopelessness or experiencing hallucinations.
